info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 10:55AM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Water reaches the Maples area of Shelton. At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:31 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 12.1 feet this afternoon. It`s expected to fall below flood stage this evening to around 10 feet, however it will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and will rise to 15.9 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall Saturday during the day but remain just above flood stage through Sunday night, before falling below flood stage again early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 10 am: 11.3 Forecast: Fri 1 pm 12.1 Fri 7 pm 10.9 Sat 1 am 10.1 Sat 7 am 15.9 Sat 1 pm 12.9 Sat 7 pm 12.6 Sun 1 am 11.1 Sun 7 am 11.2 Sun 1 pm 11.2 Sun 7 pm 11.2 Mon 1 am 11.0 Mon 7 am 10.7 &&
